SA11sanss04u:12: yaḥ kulaputra mūrddhâbhiṣiktaṃ staupikaṃ vastv apaharati
SA11sanss04u:13: sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā niryātitaṃ vā /
SA11sanss04u:16: yaḥ punar dharmaṃ pratikṣipati śrāvakaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā
SA11sanss04u:18: mahāyānaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratikṣipati pratiṣedhayatîyaṃ dvitīyā mūlâpattiḥ //
SA11sanss04u:23: śīlavato vā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy apaharati apaharāyati /
SA11sanss04u:24: gṛhasthaṃ vā karoti kāye daṇḍaiḥ praharati cārake vā prakṣipati
SA11sanss04u:26: yaḥ punaḥ kṣatriyaḥ saṃcintya mātaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati
SA11sanss04u:27: pitaram arhantaṃ bhagavacchrāvakaṃ vā jīvitād vyaparopayati
SA11sanss04u:30: ebhiḥ pañcabhir ānantaryair karmabhir anyatarânyataraṃ karmôtpādayatîyaṃ caturthī mūlâpattiḥ //
SA11sanss04u:32: daśâkuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate 'nyāṃś ca bahūn
SA11sanss04u:33: satvān daśasv akuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati vinayati
SA11sanss04u:36: yaḥ punar grāmabhedaṃ janapadabhedaṃ nagarabhedaṃ rāṣṭrabhedaṃ karotîyaṃ mūlâpattiḥ //
SA11sanss04u:41: yābhir mūlâpattibhiḥ skhalitâdikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvâvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni
SA11sanss04u:43: vastupatitāḥ parājitā devamanuṣyamahāyānamukhād apāyagāmino bhavanti ciraṃ ca saṃsāre sīdanti
SA11sanss04u:46: ye satvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunâsmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke
SA11sanss04u:47: upapannās tae itvarakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃniḥśrityêdaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ mahāyānaṃ śṛṇvanti /
SA11sanss04u:50: teṣāṃ ādikarmikā ye ca bodhisatvêdaṃ paramagambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrântaṃ śṛṇvanti uddiśanti paṭhanti /
SA11sanss04u:51: te yathāśrutaṃ yathāparyavāptaṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvabuddhisadṛśānāṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ vistareṇâgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti /
SA11sanss04u:52: te hy akṛtaśamā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvantôttrasyanti
SA11sanss04u:58: yayā mūlâpattyā sa kulaputraḥ sarvaṃ pūrvâvaropitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ jhāṣayati /
SA11sanss04u:61: tasmād bodhisatvena mahāsatvena parapudgalānām āśayânuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathâśayānāṃ satvānām anupūrveṇa
SA11sanss04u:65: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid eva
SA11sanss04u:68: na tvaṃ śakyasi ṣaṭpāramitāsu caryāṃ cartuṃ /
SA11sanss04u:69: na tvaṃ śakyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
SA11sanss04u:70: śīghraṃ tvaṃ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam
SA11sanss04u:73: yāvad yathāpūrvôktam iyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya dvit-yā
SA11sanss04u:75: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid evaṃ vakṣyati /
SA11sanss04u:77: śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
SA11sanss04u:80: yat te kiñcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayād akuśalaṃ karma
SA11sanss04u:81: samudānītaṃ tena pāṭhena śuddhir bhavaty avipākaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:82: yāvad yathāpūrvôktam ayam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya tṛtīyā
SA11sanss04u:84: punar aparaṃ kulaputra keṣāñcid ādikarmiko bodhisatvâivaṃ vakṣyati /
SA11sanss04u:86: mā śṛṇuta mā paṭhata mā pareṣām upadiśata /
SA11sanss04u:88: na yūyaṃ tasmāt mahat phalaṃ prāpsyatha /
SA11sanss04u:89: na yūyaṃ tato nidānāc chaktāḥ kleśântaṃ kartuṃ /
SA11sanss04u:91: śṛṇuta mahāyānaṃ paṭhata mahāyānaṃ pareṣāṃ côpadiśata /
SA11sanss04u:94: yadi te tasya vacanakāriṇo bhavantîdṛśaṃ dṛṣṭigatam
SA11sanss04u:96: ubhayor api mūlâpatir bhavatîyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya
SA11sanss04u:98: punar aparam ādikarmikā bodhisatvā dvijihvikā bhavanti anyathā
SA11sanss04u:100: idaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ kīrtiśabdaślokârthaṃ lŌübhasatkŌürahetoḥ paṭhanti svâdhyŌüyanti dhŌürayanti vŌücayanti
SA11sanss04u:107: te pareṣām īrṣyāyanti lābhasatkārahetor yatas te labhante
SA11sanss04u:108: upabhogaparibhogān parebhyas tatpratyayāt te prakupyanti teṣāṃ câvarṇaṃ niścārayanti kutsanti paṃsayanti vijugupsanti /
SA11sanss04u:110: atas te īrṣyahetunā côttarimanuṣyadharmair ātmānaṃ vijñapayanti /
SA11sanss04u:111: tatas te tena vastunā patitāḥ parājitā mahāyānasukhād etāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante yayâpāyagāmino bhavanti /
SA11sanss04u:112: yathā kaścit puruṣo ratnadvīpaṃ gacched gantuṃ nāvā samudram
SA11sanss04u:113: avatarate sa mahāsamudre svayam eva tāṃ nāvaṃ bhindyāt tatrâiva
SA11sanss04u:115: evam eva ye ādikarmikā bodhisatvā mahāguṇasāgaram
SA11sanss04u:117: tatpratyayāt te śraddhānāvaṃ bhittvā prajñājīvitena viyogaṃ prāpnuvanti /
SA11sanss04u:118: evaṃ te bālâdikarmikā bodhisatvêrṣyāhetor anṛtapratyayā mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante /
SA11sanss04u:122: śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrântâdhāraṇīkṣāntisamādhibhūmisvalaṃkṛtamahāvidvatpuruṣāṇāṃ kṛtaśramāṇāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ gocarās tān mahāyānasūtrântān dhārayanti
SA11sanss04u:123: paṭhanti svâdhyāyanti pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa vācayitvā
SA11sanss04u:125: ahaṃ cêmān dharmān svabuddhyā buddhvâivaṃ ca punar ahaṃ kāruṇyahetos tavôpadiśāmi /
SA11sanss04u:126: tvayā vā punas tathā bhāvayitavyaṃ yathā tvam atra gambhīreṣu
SA11sanss04u:130: evaṃ te jñānadarśanaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā mama /
SA11sanss04u:131: etarhi na punar eva dadāti paṭhitamātreṇâham imān evaṃrūpān
SA11sanss04u:134: tatpratyayāt sarvatryadhvagatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhisatvānām āryapudgalānāṃ ca purataḥ sâparādhiko bhavati /
SA11sanss04u:142: tad yathā kaścit puruṣo mahâṭavīṃ prasthitaḥ
SA11sanss04u:144: āhārârthaṃ sôdāraphalavṛkṣam apahāya gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam anāsvādya viṣavṛkṣam abhiruhya viṣaphalāni
SA11sanss04u:147: ye durlabhaṃ manuṣyalābhaṃ labdhvā kalyāṇamitraṃ sanniśritya
SA11sanss04u:149: upadarśayanti parān paṃsayanti evaṃrūpāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim
SA11sanss04u:150: āpadyante yayā gurukayâpattyā sarvavijñānāṃ paramajugupsitā bhavanti /
SA11sanss04u:151: apāyagāminas tathārūpāś ca pudgalā na sevanīyāḥ
SA11sanss04u:153: yaś ca tān sevate sa sâtisāro bhavati sarvavijñānāṃ /
SA11sanss04u:156: kṣatriyāṇāṃ purohitacaṇḍālâmātyacaṇḍālā bhaṭacaṇḍālā mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamānino mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ /
SA11sanss04u:164: tenôpadraveṇa te bhikṣavaḥ paudgalikaṃ vā sāṃghikaṃ vā
SA11sanss04u:165: cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā staupikaṃ vā śramaṇair apahṛtya
SA11sanss04u:181: tena ca hetunā bhikṣūṇām apy upaśāntāḥ kleśā nôpaśamyanti
SA11sanss04u:183: tatkāle punas te bhikṣavâśayavipannā bhavanti śīlavipannāś ca bhavanti /
SA11sanss04u:190: te bhūyasyā mātrayā saparicārasya kṣatriyasya satkṛtā bhavanti
SA11sanss04u:192: te ca prahāṇâbhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gṛhastheṣv avarṇaṃ niścārayanti /
SA11sanss04u:193: sa ca kṣatriyaḥ saparivāraḥ prahāṇâbhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇām
SA11sanss04u:196: yas tatra prahāṇikānāṃ bhikṣūṇām upabhogaparibhogas taṃ svâdhyāyâbhiratānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ niryātayanti /
SA11sanss04u:208: yadi te bodhisatvâkāśagarbhasya bodhisatvasya nāma śrutvā
SA11sanss04u:211: yadi te ākāśagarbhaṃ bodhisatvaṃ namaskuryuḥ nāma câsya
SA11sanss04u:212: parikīrttayeyus teṣāṃ sa kulaputro yathā bhāgyatayā svarūpeṇâgratas tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇarūpeṇa yāvad dārikārūpeṇa purataḥ
SA11sanss04u:222: yadi teṣāṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ na dadāti /
SA11sanss04u:224: tenâdikarmikeṇa bodhisatvena sâparādhena paścime yāme utthāyâsanāt prāṅmukhena sthitvā dhūpaṃ dhūpayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:227: aruṇâruṇa mahākṛpa mahābhāga mahôditas tvaṃ jambudvīpe
SA11sanss04u:229: śīghram ākāśagarbhaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ mama vacanena bodhaya /
SA11sanss04u:231: mama svapnântare tam upāyam upadarśaya yenâham upāyenâpattiṃ pratideśayāmi /
SA11sanss04u:233: tena tatkālaṃ śayyāyāṃ nidrāpayitavyaṃ sahôdgate 'ruṇe iha
SA11sanss04u:236: tasyâdikarmikasya bodhisatvasya svapnântare purataḥ sthitvā tāṃ mūlâpattiṃ deśayati mahāyānôpāyena /
SA11sanss04u:240: sudṛḍhavyavasthitaś ca bhavati mahāyānae ity ādi //
SA11sanss04u:241: atha vā yo 'tra sūtre 'dhyeṣaṇamantraḥ pūrvam uktaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:244: araṇye upavane 'bhyavakāśe vāgaraṃ vā tagaraṃ vā kālânusāri
SA11sanss04u:246: prāñjalinā ca bhūtvā samantato digvidikṣu ca pañcamaṇḍalakena
SA11sanss04u:256: murara vegadhāri namucame bhujayata kāruṇika cintāmaṇi pūraya kāruṇika
SA11sanss04u:268: yadi kṣatriyâdayo 'pi bodhisatvāḥ katham eṣām āpattiniyamo 'nyeṣāṃ câdhikyaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:275: ṣāṃ yatra bahulaṃ saṃbhavaḥ te tatrâkoṭitāḥ
SA11sanss04u:278: yena vā prakṛtimahāsâvadyatayâsamādāno 'py abhavyo bhavaty ucchinnakuśalamūlaś ca sutarāṃ tena sāmvarikêty alam
SA11sanss04u:281: kiṃ vâpi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ prātimokṣaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ kalpaśatasahasram api mūlaphalabhakṣaḥ syāt /
SA11sanss04u:283: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiś ca manasikārair vihared iyaṃ bodhisatvasya gurukā mūlâpattiḥ /
SA11sanss04u:284: tad yathā kulaputra śrāvakayānīyo mūlâpattim āpannaḥ so 'bhavyas tair eva skandhaiḥ parinirvātum /
SA11sanss04u:285: evam eva kulaputro 'pratideśyâitām āpattim aniḥsṛjya tān
SA11sanss04u:306: daṇḍāpayed vā śramaṇān dadyād vā śaraṇatrayāt //
SA11sanss04u:307: gṛhṇīyād dīyamānaṃ vā śamathe tyājanāt punaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:317: yo mahābrahman mamôddiśya pravrajito duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣu-
SA11sanss04u:322: atha ca punaḥ sa duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣur adyâpi
SA11sanss04u:323: sarvadevānāṃ yāvat sarvamanuṣyāṇāṃ yāvat puṇyanidhīnāṃ darśayitā bhavati kalyāṇamitraṃ /
SA11sanss04u:324: kiṃ câpi sâpātrībhūtaḥ tena ca punaḥ śirastuṇḍamuṇḍena
SA11sanss04u:328: tasmād yo mamôddiśya pravrajitaḥ śīlavān duḥśīlo vā tasya
SA11sanss04u:329: nânujānāmi cakravarttir ājñām api yan mamôddiśya
SA11sanss04u:330: pravrajitasya sahadharmeṇâpi kāye daṇḍaprahāraṃ vā dātuṃ cārake vā prakṣeptuṃ /
SA11sanss04u:331: aṅgam aṅgaṃ vikarttanaṃ vā kartuṃ jīvitād vā vyaparopaṇaṃ kartuṃ-
SA11sanss04u:335: atha ca punaḥ sa pudgalo gorocanakastūrikāsadṛśêti /
SA11sanss04u:337: ye mamôddiśya pravrajitān yānabhūtān pātrabhūtān vā
SA11sanss04u:338: viheṭhayiṣyanti te sarveṣāṃ tryadhvagatānāṃ buddhānām atīva
SA11sanss04u:345: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahūni śrāvakaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni
SA11sanss04u:346: ca bodhisatvaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bhagavato 'ntike evaṃrūpaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ karmâvaraṇaṃ pratideśayanti /
SA11sanss04u:347_0: vayam api bhadanta bhagavan bahūnāṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pravacane pātrabhūtān
SA11sanss04u:347_1: pātrabhūtāṃś ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakayānīyān pudgalāñ jugupsitavantaḥ paṃsitavanto
SA11sanss04u:348: tena vayaṃ karmâvaraṇena triṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tīvrāṃ pracaṇḍāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhūtavantaḥ //
SA11sanss04u:353: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān vacanais tarjitavantaḥ paribhāṣitavantaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:355: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān apātrabhūtān patrâbhūtāṃś ca
SA11sanss04u:362: vayaṃ bhagavantam uddiśya pravrajitān gṛhasthān kāritavantaḥ
SA11sanss04u:367: pātrabhūtāś ca sâparādhikāś cārake prakṣiptās tena vayaṃ karmâvaraṇena bahūn kalpāṃs tṛṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tī-
SA11sanss04u:377: caturbhir mahānāman dharmaiḥ samanvāgato gṛhī akṣaṇaprāpto bhavati /
SA11sanss04u:378: jātyandhaś ca jaḍaś câjihvakaś ca caṇḍālaś ca jātu
SA11sanss04u:379: sukhito bhavaty abhyākhyānabahulaś ca ṣaṇḍakaś ca paṇḍakaś ca
SA11sanss04u:381: strī ca bhavati śvā ca śūkaraś ca gardabhaś côṣṭraś ca
SA11sanss04u:382: āśīviṣaś ca bhavati tatra tatra jātau //
SA11sanss04u:384: iha mahānāman gṛhī pūrvajinakrṭâdhikārāṇāṃ satvānāṃ naiṣkramyacittasya pravrajyācittasyâryamārgacittasyântarāyaṃ karoti /
SA11sanss04u:386: punar aparaṃ gṛhī dhanalaulyena putralaulyena karmavipākam
SA11sanss04u:387: aśraddadhat putrasya vā duhitur vā bhāryāyā vā jñātisaṃghasyâiśvaryasthāne vartamāne pravrajyântarāyaṃ karoti /
SA11sanss04u:400: kapālântaracarā nāma pakṣiṇo ye mastakaṃ bhittvā
SA11sanss04u:402: jihvâmiṣabhujo nāma pakṣiṇo ye jihvāṃ vidāryâbhito 'bhitaḥ prabhakṣayanti /
SA11sanss04u:403: sâpi jihvā bhuktā punar api saṃjāyate padmadalakomalatarā /
SA11sanss04u:413: marmaguhyakā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sarvāṇi marmavivarāṇi bhittvā
SA11sanss04u:414: marmāṇi kṛntayitvā vivarāṇi praviśya majjāmaṇḍaṃ pibanti
SA11sanss04u:416: sūcīchidrā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sūcīsadṛśatuṇḍā raktaṃ pibanti /
SA11sanss04u:419: keśôṇḍukā nāma pakṣiṇo ye keśamūlāny utpāṭayanti //
SA11sanss04u:422: tatra tair anyair nārakeyaiḥ sahânekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi
SA11sanss04u:424: sa kathañcid api tasmān muktaḥ sarvasmād duṣkhajālaparivṛtaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:425: śvabhraprapāto nāma dvitīyaḥ pradeśas tatra gacchati /
SA11sanss04u:426: trāṇânveṣī śaraṇânveṣī paritrāṇânveṣī samantatâikādaśabhir arciskandhair āvṛto niḥsahāyaḥ
SA11sanss04u:429: abhiprapannas taṃ śvabhraprapātaṃ nāma pradeśam anudhāvati /
SA11sanss04u:434: sukumārataraḥ ślakṣṇataraḥ kharābhis tīvrābhir vedanābhir abhibhūtaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:435: tasyâivaṃ bhayaviklavavadanasya karacaraṇasarvâṅgapratyaṅgapravilīyamānasya sa pradeśaḥ śvabhraprapāto nāma prādurbhavati /
SA11sanss04u:436: sa tasmin deśe nipatati patitaḥ śvabhre prapatati trīṇi
SA11sanss04u:440: yāvat tasyâivam utkṣipyamānasya ca prapatataś cânekāni
SA11sanss04u:442: kathañcid api tasmān muktaḥ paribhrāmitaś cakrâṅkaṃ vivaraṃ nāma pradeśam anudhāvati /
SA11sanss04u:443: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe sahasrârāṇi cakrāṇi prādurbhavanti
SA11sanss04u:444: vajranābhīni tīkṣṇajvālāni śīghrabhramāṇi tasya sahagamanād eva tā-
SA11sanss04u:448: pratyekaṃ sarvâṅgāni pramathnanto dahanti pādatale câsya
SA11sanss04u:453: bhukto bhuktaḥ punar api saṃjāyate sukumārataraḥ /
SA11sanss04u:458: sâiṣa duṣkṛtakarmântacārī ālātacakranirmāṇagandharvanagaramṛgatṛṣṇikāsadṛśaṃ mahad arthajātaṃ paśyati ratnavastradhanadhānyanikarabhūtaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:468: na câsyânādikālapravṛttaḥ sa lobhas tām apy avasthāṃ gatasya parihīyatae iti //
SA11sanss04u:470: eṣa sa pāpakartā tasmāc chastrasaṅkaṭān muktaḥ kathamapy aṅgārakarṣūr laṅghayitvā karmaṇā bhrāmitaḥ pradeśam anyaṃ prapadyate /
SA11sanss04u:471: vitathadarśanaṃ nāma tatra karmakṛtāṃ striyaṃ paśyati yā tena
SA11sanss04u:474: sa tena dhāvati yena tā striyaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:477: gṛhītvā câuṣṭhāt prabhṛti tathā bhujyate yathâsya
SA11sanss04u:482: sa kaṭukāṃ kharāṃ vedanām anubhavaṃs tasmād rāgâgner na
SA11sanss04u:484: yena tā striyas tena bhūyaḥ saḥ saṃdhāvati /
SA11sanss04u:488: atha tā striyo bhūyo vajramayâyomayaprajvalitagātrās taṃ manuṣyam ādāya jvālāmālâkulasarvaśarīrās taṃ nārakeyaṃ siktāmuṣṭivad bhindanti /
SA11sanss04u:492: strīvidheyā narā ye tu kutas teṣāṃ bhavet sukham //
SA11sanss04u:495: strī vināśo vināśānām iha loke paratra ca /
SA11sanss04u:496: tasmāt striyo vivarjyāḥ syur yadîcchet sukham ātmanêti //
SA11sanss04u:498: sa tair yamapuruṣair gṛhyate gṛhītvā ca tanmukhaṃ vidārayanti
SA11sanss04u:500: sā ca jihvā karmavaśāt pañcayojanaśatapramāṇā bhavati /
SA11sanss04u:505: karmakṛtaṃ ca halasahasraṃ prādurbhavati pradīptâgrasaṃyuktaṃ balavadbhir balīvardais tad asyântargataṃ jihvāyāṃ vahati /
SA11sanss04u:508: sā ca jihvā tathā sukumārā yathā devānām akṣi //
SA11sanss04u:509: yāvat sa vedanātas tanati krandati vikrośati na câsya tadduḥkhaṃ kaścid apanayatîti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanss04u:512: sā kathañcit tasya nārakasya mukhe praviśati /
SA11sanss04u:513: sa bhayavihvalavadano yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate 'ṅgārakarṣūṣu
SA11sanss04u:519: te taṃ puruṣaṃ mastakāt prabhṛti yāvat pādau cūrṇayantîty ādi //
SA11sanss04u:520: paiśunyavipākas tu yathâiva mṛṣāvādasya trīṇi yojanaśatāni
SA11sanss04u:522: tāṃ yamapuruṣā nistriṃśān ādāya pradīptadhārān jihvāṃ nikṛntanti /
SA11sanss04u:524: paramakaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ prativedayate sa krandati vikrośaty avyaktâkṣaraṃ jihvāvirahitêty ādi //
SA11sanss04u:526: te tāṃ jihvām āsyaṃ vidārya gṛhṇanti /
SA11sanss04u:527: gṛhītvā niśitadhāraiḥ śastraiś chittvā tasya bhūyâiva
SA11sanss04u:531: sā ca jihvā chinnā punar api saṃjāyate karmavaśāt /
SA11sanss04u:538: jihvādhanor vinirmuktas tīkṣṇo vāg viśikhas tvayā /
SA11sanss04u:539: pāruṣyam iti yad dṛṣṭaṃ tasyâitat phalam āgatam //
SA11sanss04u:542: tasya tat prajvalitaṃ tāmradravalohitaṃ jihvāṃ dahati /
SA11sanss04u:544: kaṇṭhaṃ dagdhvā hṛdayaṃ dahati hṛdayaṃ dagdhvântrāṇi dahati /
SA11sanss04u:550: abaddhaṃ yat tvayā proktaṃ tasyâitat phalam āgataṃ //
SA11sanss04u:551: yā na [[DOUBT]] satyavatī nityaṃ na câdhyayanatatparā /
SA11sanss04u:552: na sā jihvā budhair dṛṣṭā kevalaṃ māṃsakhaṇḍikā /
SA11sanss04u:555: atha paśyati riktaṃ tuccham asārakaṃ karmakṛtaṃ bahudraviṇaṃ paraparigṛhītaṃ tasya karmacoditavyāmohitasyâivaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss04u:557: tataḥ sa nārakas tenâiva dhāvati yena tad dravyaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:558: tasyâbhidhyâkhyamānasasyâkuśalasyâsevitabhāvitabahulīkṛtasya tatphalaṃ yad asau narake viparītaṃ paśyati /
SA11sanss04u:559: tasyâivaṃ paśyato 'bhidhyābahulasya haste śastraṃ prādurbhavati sa tena dhāvati /
SA11sanss04u:560: teṣām apy anyeṣāṃ nārakāṇāṃ haste śastrāṇi prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanss04u:561: sa taiḥ saha śastreṇa yudhyate yāvat tathā kartyate yathā
SA11sanss04u:562: sarṣapaphalamātram api na bhavati māṃsam asya śarīre tathâsthikaṅkālâvaśeṣaḥ kriyate //
SA11sanss04u:570: etebhyo bhayabhīto yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate /
SA11sanss04u:571: sa kathaṃ śaknoti palāyitum aśubhasya karmaṇaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:573: gṛhītvā ca pūrvaṃ tāvan mastakād bhujyate yāvat pārśvataḥ
SA11sanss04u:576: pādāv api vahninā dāhyete sa yamapuruṣair dūrād iṣubhir vidhyatae iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanss04u:587: yenâśramaṇena śramaṇapratijñena mātṛgrāmasya nṛttagītasyâbharaṇānāṃ vā śabdaṃ śrutvâyoniśena manaskāreṇâkṣiptabuddhinā tac chrutvā hasitalaḍitakrīḍitāny aśucim
SA11sanss04u:590: tatra te nārakâyovarṣeṇa sarvâṅgapratyaṅgaśaś cūrṇyante 'ṅgāravarṣeṇa ca pacyante dahyantae ity ādi /
SA11sanss04u:594: te droṇiṣv ayomayair muṣalair hanyantae iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanss04u:595: evam apsarasaḥ prārthanayā brahmacaryapariṇāmanān mahāpadumo nāma narakôktaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:597: tasyāṃ nadyāṃ yāny asthīni te pāṣāṇāḥ /
SA11sanss04u:604: evaṃ puruṣasya puruṣeṇa saha maithunavipratipatteḥ aprameyâkāraṇā viśeṣāḥ paṭhyante /
SA11sanss04u:605: evaṃ śiśubhiḥ saha vipratipatteḥ kṣāranadyām uhyamānān dārakān
SA11sanss04u:612: tāsām eva govaḍavâdīnāṃ taptâyomayīnāṃ akuśalanirmitānāṃ yonimārgeṇa sa tiryakkāmasevī praviśati /
SA11sanss04u:617: evam anyanāśitāsv api bhikṣuṇīṣu vipratipannānāṃ mahānarakapātanāḥ paṭhyante /
SA11sanss04u:619: evaṃ prasahyânītāsv api parastrīṣu labdhāsu ca kanyāsu /
SA11sanss04u:621: jñātiśabdamānitāsu ca vipratipatteḥ tīvrāś câparimāṇāś ca mahānarakapātanāḥ paṭhyante //
SA11sanss04u:624: sa nêhâiva mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ dvayaṃ samāpadyate 'pi tu
SA11sanss04u:626: sa tadā svādayati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
SA11sanss04u:627: ayam ucyate brāhmaṇa brahmacārī saṃyukto maithunena dharmeṇa na
SA11sanss04u:639: yataś câite kāmâivaṃ smaraṇaprārthanāviṣayam api gatâivam
SA11sanss04u:642: sabhayaś câiṣa mārgaḥ sapratibhayaḥ sakaṇṭakaḥ sagahanaḥ
SA11sanss04u:657: yathā mṛgāṇāṃ bandhanāya kūṭaṃ dvijānāṃ bandhanāya
SA11sanss04u:665: yāvad goghātakānāṃ gavâsanānāṃ mukhe parivartitasyânto na
SA11sanss04u:667: yāvan maṇḍūkānāṃ satāṃ sarpāṇāṃ mukhe parivartitasyânto na prajñāyate /
SA11sanss04u:672: radārikāḥ pāripanthikā grāmaghātakā janapadaghātakā yāvad granthimocakêti kṛtvā gṛhītānāṃ śiraśchinnānām
SA11sanss04u:674: duṣkhaṃ tīvraṃ kharaṃ kaṭukam anubhūtaṃ rudhiraṃ prasyanditaṃ pragharitaṃ yac caturṣu mahāsamudreṣûdakāt
SA11sanss04u:682: tad yathā cakṣūrogaḥ śrotrarogo yāvad arśāṃsi piṭako bhagandaraḥ //
SA11sanss04u:690: yāvan nârhasy evam udgharantaṃ pragharantaṃ jugupsanīyaṃ kāyaṃ pratiṣevituṃ //
SA11sanss04u:698: tvaṃ ca kāmān pratisevya vinipātagato bhaviṣyasi /
SA11sanss04u:704: tena kāmamithyâcārāt prativiratena bhavitavyaṃ svadārasaṃtuṣṭena paradārânabhilāṣiṇâraktanetraprekṣiṇā nirviṇṇamanasā /
SA11sanss04u:714: tathâhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā saṃkalpair api kāmān na paribhokṣye /
SA11sanss04u:715: kaḥ punar vādo dvîndriyasamāpattyā vânaṅgavijñaptyā vêti //
SA11sanss04u:730: mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ vihāyasântarīkṣe
SA11sanss04u:731: tālamātram abhyudgamya sthitvā ca taṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata //
SA11sanss04u:732: kāyaṃ mamêkṣadhvam imaṃ manojñaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ jvalanaprakāśam /
SA11sanss04u:733: na raktacittasya hi mānuṣasya prajñāyate śobhanakaṃ śarīram //
SA11sanss04u:734: ye etv agnikarṣûpamasaṃpradīptān tyajanti kāmān viṣayeṣv agṛddhāḥ /
SA11sanss04u:735: ṣaḍindriyaiḥ saṃvarasaṃvṛtāś ca ye brahmacaryaṃ ca caranti śubham //
SA11sanss04u:736: dṛṣṭvā ca dārān hi parasya ye vai kurvanti mātābhaginîti
SA11sanss04u:738: prāsādikās te hi sudarśanīyā bhavanti nityaṃ paramaṃ manojñāḥ //
SA11sanss04u:739: sphuṭām imāṃ vettha purīṃ samantād yo romakūpān mama câtigandhaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:743: na me samutpadyati rāgacittaṃ mā vītarāgāsu janīṣva rāgaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:744: sākṣī mamâyaṃ purato munîndraḥ satyaṃ yathā vedmi na jātu
SA11sanss04u:748: bhrātā svasā câpi pitā babhūva ko rāgacittaṃ janayej jananyāṃ //
SA11sanss04u:755: na nirvṛtiṃ yānti ca raktacittā rāgo hi tasmāt parivarjanīyaḥ //
SA11sanss04u:761: kāṇāś ca khañjāś ca vijihvakāś ca /
SA11sanss04u:763: bhavanti nānāvidhadoṣabhājāś caranti ye kāmacarīṃ jaghanyām //
SA11sanss04u:766: brahmāṇêśā [[DOUBT]] vaśavarttinaś ca tad brahmacaryaṃ vipulaṃ caritvā //
SA11sanss04u:771: kṣitîśvarāś câiva bhavanty udagrāḥ suśreṣṭhino vai
SA11sanss04u:773: sukhasaumanasyena ca yānti vṛddhiṃ ye brahmacaryaṃ vipulaṃ caranti //
SA11sanss04u:789: mārasya gocaro hy eṣa prasthitā yena durgatiḥ /
SA11sanss04u:791: kīṭakumbho yathā citro yatra yatrâiva dṛśyate /
SA11sanss04u:794: daurgandhyaṃ sravate kāyād bālānāṃ tad yathā madhu //
SA11sanss04u:796: gaṇḍabhūto hy ayaṃ kāyaḥ kutsito hy āmagandhikaḥ //
SA11sanss04u:798: evam eva hy ayaṃ kāyo viṣṭhâdyaśucibhājanam //
SA11sanss04u:805: bālā nimittaṃ gṛhṇanti vacane darśane 'pi ca //
SA11sanss04u:806: uktāḥ paścān na jānanti yo deśaḥ sarvakutsitaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:809: kakṣāsv āgharate svedo gandho vāyati kutsitaḥ //
SA11sanss04u:810: kurvanti duṣkṛtaṃ karma yena gacchanti durgatim /
SA11sanss04u:811: hīnān kāmān niṣevanto hīnān dharmān niṣevya ca //
SA11sanss04u:814: tasmād dhīnasya hīnābhiḥ strībhir bhavati saṅgatiḥ /
SA11sanss04u:816: yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ labhate phalam //
SA11sanss04u:821: upasaṃhṛtair na prabhavanti śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dānaṃ dātuṃ kṛpaṇavanīpakayācakebhyo 'vaśīkṛtāḥ strībhiḥ
SA11sanss04u:823: tenâiva strīpremṇā tasyâiva poṣaṇāya na śaknuvanti dānaṃ dātuṃ śīlaṃ ca samādātuṃ /
SA11sanss04u:824: sa tatra raktaḥ samānaḥ strīparibhāṣitāni sahate
SA11sanss04u:826: sa mātṛgrāmeṇa tarjitaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsīdati viṣīdati sukhaṃ câsyâvalokayati /
SA11sanss04u:828: ayaṃ mahārāja kāmalolupasya puruṣasyôccārasukhaparamasyâśucau ratasyâsaṃprajanyâcāriṇo doṣaḥ //
SA11sanss04u:831: śrutvêdṛśaṃ tu saṃvegaṃ na teṣāṃ bhavati nirvṛtiḥ /
SA11sanss04u:832: bhūyaḥ kurvanti saṃsargaṃ strībhiḥ sārddhaṃ pramoditāḥ //
SA11sanss04u:835: strīgataṃ câsya tac cittaṃ viḍālasyêva mūṣike //
SA11sanss04u:839: dṛṣṭvā vai athôccāraṃ gṛddhatāṃ janayaty asau //
SA11sanss04u:841: hīnān kāmān niṣevante yena gacchanti durgatiṃ //
SA11sanss04u:842: raktāḥ pramattāḥ kāmeṣu kṛtvā karma supāpakam /
SA11sanss04u:848: labdhvā kṣaṇaṃ hi sa prajño dharmaṃ śrutvā cêdṛśam /
SA11sanss04u:849: sarvān kāmān vivarjyêha pravrajyāṃ niṣkramed budha /

SA11sanss04u:899: tad yathā mañjuśrīr vajramaṇiratnaṃ nânyena kāṣṭhena
SA11sanss04u:900: loṣṭhena vā śakyaṃ bhettum anyatra vajrād /

SA11sanss04u:983: tat kiṃ manyase kulaputrâpi nu sa puruṣo bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet //
SA11sanss04u:985: bahu bhadanta bhagavan sa puruṣaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaved aprameyam
SA11sanss04u:987: na tasya puṇyaskandhasya kenacic chakyaṃ pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ anyatra tathāgatena //
SA11sanss04u:989: yas tu kulaputra kṣatriyakalyāṇo vā yāvad yathā pūrvôktaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:992: yāvad vipulataram apramāṇataram asaṃkhyeyataraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati /
SA11sanss04u:993: yo mama paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ saddharmanetrī rakṣati sa rakṣaty ātmānaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:994: rakṣati parāṃś ca rakṣati paralokaṃ rakṣati mama śāsanaṃ śrāvakān pātrabhūtān apātrabhūtān vā yāva-
SA11sanss04u:999: yāvat svakaṃ rāṣṭraṃ pararāṣṭraṃ ca vardhayati /
SA11sanss04u:1001: surâlayaṃ ca prāpayati ciraṃ câyuḥ pālayati /
SA11sanss04u:1008: nityaṃ kalyāṇamitrair buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhir bodhisatvaiś ca
SA11sanss04u:1015: ye te bhadanta bhagavan etarhy anāgate 'dhvani yāvat paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ kṣatriyakalyāṇā bhavanti yāvad gahapatikalyāṇāḥ /
SA11sanss04u:1019: vayam api sarve saparivārās taṃ kṣatriyakalyāṇaṃ yāvad gahapatikalyāṇaṃ daśabhir ākārai rakṣiṣyāmaḥ
SA11sanss04u:1022: āyuś câsya vardhayiṣyāmaḥ āyurantarāyaṃ ca dharmeṇa
SA11sanss04u:1024: ārogyaṃ ca parivāraṃ ca dhanaskandhaṃ côpabhogaparibhogaṃ câiśvaryaṃ ca yaśaḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi prajñāsampadaṃ ca
SA11sanss04u:1033: yas tv eṣāṃ buddhaputrāṇāṃ naraḥ kurvītâpriyaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:1034: devān manuṣyān varjitvā narakaṃ tasya gocaraṃ //
SA11sanss04u:1036: na câtra viśeṣahetuḥ kaścid upadarśayituṃ śakyatae ity alaṃ vikalpena //
SA11sanss04u:1040: āvaraṇaṃ mañjuśrīr ucyate rāgâvaraṇaṃ dveṣâvaraṇaṃ mohâvaraṇaṃ dānam āvaraṇaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñâvaraṇaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:1042: tat kasya hetoḥ bālapṛthagjanā mañjuśrīr dānaṃ dadānā matsariṇām antike 'prasādaṃ kurvanti /
SA11sanss04u:1047: te teṣāṃ doṣaṃ śrutvā bahujanasyâprasādaṃ kurvanti /
SA11sanss04u:1054: te vīryam ārabhamāṇâtmānam utkarṣayanti parān paṃsayanti /
SA11sanss04u:1055: kusīdême bhikṣavo viharanty anabhiyuktāḥ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhuñjānāḥ /
SA11sanss04u:1057: te tena vīryârambheṇâtmānam utkarṣayanti paraṃ ca paṃsayanti /
SA11sanss04u:1059: te dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānās tatra dhyānasamāpattau spṛhām
SA11sanss04u:1074: saced bodhisatvasyântike hīnasaṃjñām utpādayati ātmani côdārasaṃjñāṃ kṣiṇoty ātmānaṃ-
SA11sanss04u:1081: na devaputra bodhisatvaḥ kvacid eva kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti /
SA11sanss04u:1088: iha dṛḍhamate sa pudgalaḥ pāñcagatike saṃsāre upapanno bhavati /
SA11sanss04u:1089: yadi vā nirayeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā deveṣu
SA11sanss04u:1101: atha khalv āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantam etad avocat /
SA11sanss04u:1105: na hy asmākam etaj jñānaṃ pravarttate /
SA11sanss04u:1108: tato vayaṃ bhagavann ajānānās tathārūpeṣu hīnasaṃjñām
SA11sanss04u:1114: sādhu sādhu kāśyapa subhāṣitā te iyaṃ vāk /
SA11sanss04u:1120: yac chīghraṃ kṣaṇyati hi bhikṣavaḥ pudgalaḥ pudgalaṃ pravicinvan /
SA11sanss04u:1121: ahaṃ vā pudgalaṃ pramiṇuyāṃ yo vā syān mādṛśaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:1122: etena kāśyapa nirdeśena bodhisatvena vā śrāvakeṇa vā
SA11sanss04u:1124: mâtra kaścid bodhisatvayānikaḥ pudgalo bhavet tena tatrâtmā rakṣitavyêti /
SA11sanss04u:1125: yasya tu niyatam eva bodhiprāpticihnam asti tatra sutarām avamanyanā
SA11sanss04u:1128: iṣṭāmayān mṛttikasaṃcitān vā prītāś ca kurvanti jinasya
SA11sanss04u:1130: uddiśya vā pāṃśukarâśayo 'pi aṭavīṣu durgeṣu ca
SA11sanss04u:1132: siktāmayā vā puna kūṭa kṛtvā ye kecid uddiśya jināna stūpān /
SA11sanss04u:1145: sarve ca te bodhi abhūṣi lābhinaḥ //
SA11sanss04u:1149: sugatānam uddiśyatha pūjanârthaṃ gītaṃ ca gītaṃ madhuraṃ manojñaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:1173: tad yathā vāḍiśikena mahaty udakasarasi matsyâkarṣaṇârthaṃ sâmiṣaṃ vaḍiśaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet samanantaraprakṣiptaṃ ca
SA11sanss04u:1175: kiṃ câpi sa matsyôdakasarasi bhramaty atha ca punar vaddhâiva
SA11sanss04u:1177: yat sa vāḍiśikâgatya tena sūtralāghavena jānāti /
SA11sanss04u:1179: tam enaṃ sūtrād gṛhītvā sthalagataṃ ka-
SA11sanss04u:1183: evam eva ye satvā buddheṣu bhagavatsu cittaṃ prasādya kuśalamūlam
SA11sanss04u:1186: kiṃ câpi te satvā duṣkṛtena karmâvaraṇenâkṣaṇeṣûpapannā bhavanty atha ca buddhā bhagavantas tān satvān bauddhena
SA11sanss04u:1187: jñānena saṃgrahavastusūtreṇa gṛhītvā saṃsārôdakasarasôddhṛtya nirvāṇasthale sthāpayantîti //
SA11sanss04u:1191: yathā meghena dramiḍena mahābodhisatvenâpi satā navakâryasudhanaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya vanditaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:1201: kiṃ ca buddhānām apy evam iṣyate /
SA11sanss04u:1206: yo hi kaścin mañjuśrīs tathāgatabhāṣitadharme kasmiṃścic chobhanasaṃjñāṃ karoti /
SA11sanss04u:1211: yâivaṃ vadatîdaṃ yuktam idam ayuktam iti sa saddharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanss04u:1212: na mayā pṛthak kaścid dharmaḥ śrāvakayānasaṃprayuktaḥ
SA11sanss04u:1214: tat te mohapuruṣêmaṃ mama dharmaṃ nānākariṣyanti /
SA11sanss04u:1215: idaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ deśitam idaṃ pratyekabuddhānām idaṃ bodhisatvānām iti /
SA11sanss04u:1224: apagate buddhôtpāde nâsti dhāraṇīpratilambhêti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanss04u:1234: āloko 'sya dharmāṇāṃ na suviditêti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanss04u:1235: mantreṇa mantram abudhyamānaḥ prativadatîti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanss04u:1239: akṣarasaṃjñayā kañcid adhimuktaṃ karoti kañcin na karotîti
SA11sanss04u:1244: ihâsyâsti caryêhâsya nâsti caryêti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanss04u:1245: idaṃ sûktam idam asûktam iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanss04u:1248: dharmaṃ pratikṣipatîti hi mañjuśrīr yāvat kiñcid vilopayati
SA11sanss04u:1250: dharmabhāṇakasyêdaṃ rūpam iti cintayati vadati bhikṣur vā
SA11sanss04u:1254: yasya kasyacit kulaputra tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dharmaḥ pratibhāti
SA11sanss04u:1256: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi yady ekasatvasyâpi ekaromaharṣo bhaved ekâśrupāto vā sarvaḥ sa tathāgatânubhāvena /
SA11sanss04u:1257: tatra mohapuruṣâbodhisatvā bodhisatvapratijñā bodhisatvadūṣakā dharmastainyakuhakâivaṃ vakṣyanti
SA11sanss04u:1268: yo bodhisatvo dharmabhāṇakam apavādati buddhaṃ sa vigarhati
SA11sanss04u:1269: dharmaṃ sa pratikṣipati saṃghaṃ sa jugupsati /
SA11sanss04u:1271: buddhaṃ sa na draṣṭukāmo yo dharmabhāṇakam adraṣṭukāmaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:1272: buddhasya so 'varṇaṃ bhāṣate yo dharmabhāṇakasyâvarṇaṃ bhāṣate /
SA11sanss04u:1273: buddhas tena parityakto bhavati yaḥ prathamacittôtpādike 'pi
SA11sanss04u:1276: yo 'py ayaṃ maitreya ṣaṭpāramitāsamudāgamo bodhisatvānāṃ saṃbodhāya taṃ te mohapuruṣâivaṃ vakṣyanti /
SA11sanss04u:1280: tat kiṃ manyase 'jita duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśirājâbhūd yena
SA11sanss04u:1285: yāni mayā maitreya bodhisatvacaryāṃ caratā ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāny upacitāni apakṛtaṃ nu taiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ //
SA11sanss04u:1289: tvaṃ tāvad ajita ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān dānapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān śīlapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān
SA11sanss04u:1290: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān vīryapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ /
